MS MCQs

    Create online presence in Dynamics 365 Commerce

    »

    1. What are the elements of the e-Commerce page model?

      Templates, layouts, page instances, and rendered pages

      Site builder tool, rendered pages, modules

      Modules, fragments, rendered pages

      Page instances, containers, modules, fragments


    2. Which one of the following statements is incorrect?

      An online channel in Commerce can be linked to one or more e-Commerce sites.

      The e-Commerce site is created and maintained in Commerce Headquarters.

      Modules are the smallest logical building block in the e-Commerce page model and can be replaced by fragments when you are building the structure of the site.

      The starter Module library is a combination of modules that have user interface aspects and functional aspects, and it can be used as a reference when you are creating a site.
